JobFullDesc: About the Role At Uber, providing world-class support to our partners (riders, drivers and restaurants) is critical to our success. Building the capability of our support teams to consistently deliver elevated levels of service is challenging and complex - and incredibly satisfying!  We’re looking for a hands-on Learning Delivery manager for our US&C Learning & Development team, specifically, someone who will be responsible for managing a team of learning delivery specialists, and own the deployment of learning initiatives. While ensuring compliance and alignment of Uber’s learning capabilities and practices within our internal channels Centers of Excellence, Greenlights and BPO Network. This role will ensure that our training initiatives are seamlessly deployed and preparing agents and experts to be equipped, supported, and ready to perform and drive Uber’s success. With thousands of support agents relying on L&D to acquire the knowledge and know-how to help our customers, it’s imperative that the L&D Delivery Manager is actively partnering with its team, channels’ stakeholders and network L&D partners to ensure efficiency, effectiveness, and alignment with our L&D business operations.  The focus of this role will continuously shift to support emerging business priorities and help solve problems where no solution currently exists.  What You’ll Do Use honed consulting skills and processes to diagnose and understand capability gaps within our channels operations/LOB.Consults with business and identify when learning support is needed to ensure Uber’s network and L&D readiness (does a thorough analysis), then works with the Delivery and Program teams to craft an appropriate solutionBuild relationships with external internal channels leadership, vendor partners, and staff stakeholders in the region to collaborate on training priorities, training quality, train-the-trainer certification, and delivery of training programs.Develop and implement meaningful ways to measure effectiveness in training and identify areas for improvement in processes and training programsProvide support and guidance to vendor managers, training teams, and quality teams across our external vendor partners in the regionResponsible for actioning and improving policies and processes to heighten the impact, delivery, and tracking of training initiatives within our Network.Raise the bar on best practices and set the pace for experimentation and innovation. Keep ahead of emerging learning principles and trends to continually challenge other L&D teams to deliver world firsts in learning experiences. Champion best practices exchange and engagement within our L&D team, network, and channels.Lead a team of high-performance Learning Delivery Specialists. Drive engagement, manage internal capacity, and coach for their success and development.Basic QualificationsBachelor’s Degree Minimum of 5 years experience in L&DSuccessful track record of delivering large-scale learning programs and initiatives across multiple functions and geographies. Understanding and experience in using metrics and Learning evaluation to drive key decisions and processes2 years of people management experiencePreferred QualificationsSubject matter expertise in Learning and Development or Organizational DevelopmentStrong project management skills with superior organizational, time management, and prioritization skillsStrong written, verbal, and visual communication skills, and proven ability to influence and drive consensus at senior levelsExperience in using standard learning experience tools and platforms
